trans-unit.source: Represents a control skin, which is a means to define stylistic properties that are applied to an ASP.NET Web server control.
Page and control developers do not use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlSkinDelegate>, ControlSkin, or <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme> classes directly.

These classes are used internally by the ASP.NET page framework to apply server-side properties and cascading style sheet definitions that are defined in ASP.NET themes and control skin files to specific types of controls.
ControlSkin objects represent a named skin or default skin of a <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> control at run time and design time.

ASP.NET builds <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme>, ControlSkin and <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlSkinDelegate> objects to apply the style elements defined in themes and control skin files to ASP.NET Web pages and controls.
For more information about themes and control skins, see [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlSkin"></xref> class using the passed <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> type and delegate.
The <xref:System.Type> of <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> to which the skin is applied, used to enforce type consistency among named skins.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlSkinDelegate"></xref> that applies the style elements defined in a control skin file to the type identified by the `controlType` parameter.
Applies the skin to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> control contained by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlSkin"></xref> object.

Passes the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> object associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlSkin> class to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlSkinDelegate>, which applies the skin to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> object.
The control to which to apply the skin.
Gets the <xref:System.Type> of the control that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlSkin"></xref> object is associated with.
The <xref:System.Type> of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> used in this instance.
